overview: Katie Fox received a Bachelors of Science in Exercise Physiology from the University of Kansas. After years of traditional sales and marketing in the health club and spa sector, she chose a more suitable path for her emerging interests. Katie found her niche helping brands build their image both on and offline and has never looked back. Her experience weighs heavily in the planning, developing and implementing of PR activities, with a creative, pro-active approach to marketing and Social Media strategies. Katie has a strong networking and writing background and makes it a priority to continually follow the evolution of the Internet and digital marketing.
